trans-unit.source:
The method used by this reminder. Possible values are:
"email" - Reminders are sent via email. "sms" - Reminders are sent via SMS. These are only available for Google Apps for Work, Education, and Government customers. Requests to set SMS reminders for other account types are ignored. "popup" - Reminders are sent via a UI popup.
Number of minutes before the start of the event when the reminder should trigger. Valid values are between 0 and 40320 (4 weeks in minutes).
